name: MTLAccelerationStructureMotionInstanceDescriptor
desc: A description of an instance in an instanced geometry acceleration structure, with the instance including a user identifier and motion data for the instance.

items.name: init()
items.desc: Creates a default acceleration structure instance.

items.name: init(options: MTLAccelerationStructureInstanceOptions, mask: UInt32, intersectionFunctionTableOffset: UInt32, accelerationStructureIndex: UInt32, userID: UInt32, motionTransformsStartIndex: UInt32, motionTransformsCount: UInt32, motionStartBorderMode: MTLMotionBorderMode, motionEndBorderMode: MTLMotionBorderMode, motionStartTime: Float, motionEndTime: Float)
items.desc: Creates a new acceleration structure instance.

items.name: var accelerationStructureIndex: UInt32
items.desc: The index of the acceleration structure to use for this instance.

items.name: var motionStartTime: Float
items.desc: The start time for the range of motion described by the keyframe data.

items.name: var motionEndTime: Float
items.desc: The end time for the range of motion described by the keyframe data.

items.name: var motionStartBorderMode: MTLMotionBorderMode
items.desc: The mode to use when handling timestamps before the start time.

items.name: var motionEndBorderMode: MTLMotionBorderMode
items.desc: The mode to use when handling timestamps after the end time.

items.name: var motionTransformsStartIndex: UInt32
items.desc: The index for the instanceâ€™s first keyframe motion data.

items.name: var motionTransformsCount: UInt32
items.desc: The number of keyframes for this instance.

items.name: var intersectionFunctionTableOffset: UInt32
items.desc: An offset used to determine which function in the intersection function table Metal should call when testing a ray against this instance.

items.name: var mask: UInt32
items.desc: A mask used for this instance when testing a ray against the geometry.

items.name: var userID: UInt32
items.desc: The user identifier for the instance.
